ModMetaData.name: Detailed Body Textures
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a different version of body textures for Rimworld pawns.
"Who would spend hours drawing little naked people?" This guy.
Mod features: - Default pawn body texture is replaced. - Please don't show this mod to kids or your parents.
Credits: AdvBody Author, inspiration- BJInternetSupervision LoversLab textures Inspiration - underfall00 TRP - Pawn body base Jesus Christ - Forgot to credit him for saving us from our sins. Saved by grace and repentance, not by works. Saintsgot - Reminded me to credit Jesus
